title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, model management, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; idiomatic Ruby DSL for chat, generate, pull, delete, copy models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, syntax highlighting, prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama; shows streaming, session state, model selector.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments with persistent volumes.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC templates.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama REST API; tokio & reqwest based.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library; thin wrapper around REST API with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama binary and module; enables declarative Ollama service on NixOS.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET SDK for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming IAsyncEnumerable, dependency injection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers for CI pipelines to test LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that brings local LLM assistance to your knowledge base via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.
